mapper.select: select c.id, c.name, c.kind, c.type, c.url, c.category_id as categoryId, c.created_at as createdAt, c.updated_at as updatedAt from class_course cc inner join course_chapter_section ccs on ccs.course_id = cc.course_id inner join section_courseware sc on sc.section_id = ccs.section_id inner join courseware c on c.id = sc.courseware_id ::uuid where cc.class_id =#{classId};

select c.id, c.name, c.kind, c.type, c.url, c.category_id as categoryId, c.created_at as createdAt, c.updated_at as updatedAt from section_courseware sc inner join courseware c on c.id = sc.courseware_id ::uuid where sc.section_id =#{sectionId};

select c.id, c.name, c.kind, c.type, c.url, c.category_id as categoryId, c.created_at as createdAt, c.updated_at as updatedAt from course_chapter_section ccs inner join section_courseware sc on sc.section_id = ccs.section_id inner join courseware c on c.id = sc.courseware_id ::uuid where ccs.chapter_id =#{chapterId};

select c.id, c.name, c.kind, c.type, c.url, c.category_id as categoryId, c.created_at as createdAt, c.updated_at as updatedAt from course_chapter_section ccs inner join section_courseware sc on sc.section_id = ccs.section_id inner join courseware c on c.id = sc.courseware_id ::uuid where sc.section_id =#{courseId};

mapper.update: update courseware set name= #{coursewareName} where id=#{id}::uuid
